signature_matches.name: stealth_network
signature_matches.description: Network activity detected but not expressed in monitor API logs
Creates hidden files without content (potentially used as a mutex)
Sample contains only a LOAD segment without any section mappings

match_data: $Info: This file is packed with the UPX executable packer http://upx.sf.net $
$Id: UPX 4.22 Copyright (C) 1996-2024 the UPX Team. All Rights Reserved. $

signature_matches.description: Reads the 'hosts' file potentially containing internal network hosts
Connects to IPs without corresponding DNS lookups
Reads system information from the proc file system
Detected TCP or UDP traffic on non-standard ports
URLs found in memory or binary data
ELF contains segments with high entropy indicating compressed/encrypted content

mitre_attack_techniques.signature_description: Adversaries may communicate using application layer protocols to avoid detection/network filtering by blending in with existing traffic.
Detected one or more anomalous HTTP requests
Detected HTTP requests to some non white-listed domains
Some process has originated direct HTTPS traffic with one or more hosts.
Network activity detected but not expressed in API logs
Creates hidden files, links and/or directories
ELF contains segments with high entropy indicating compressed/encrypted content
Reads system information from the proc file system
Detected TCP or UDP traffic on non-standard ports

ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET INFO DERO Crypto Mining Related Domain in DNS Lookup
ET INFO DERO Crypto Mining Related Domain in DNS Lookup
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO DERO Crypto Mining Related Domain in DNS Lookup"; dns.query; bsize:27; content:"community-pools.mysrv.cloud"; nocase; reference:md5,10741cc3063b3b940929dc29cf7636c0; reference:url,www.crowdstrike.com/blog/crowdstrike-discovers-first-ever-dero-cryptojacking-campaign-targeting-kubernetes; classtype:coin-mining; sid:2046700; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2023_06_29, deployment Perimeter, former_category INFO, performance_impact Low, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2023_06_29; target:src_ip;)
